title: I wanna PBE
body: Riot give me PBE account plsss . I wanna try new champions and new skins {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
hi riot i wanna be pbe pls what i can do pls i am b3 600 wins classique i have 59 champs my name acc is bentaieb
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

We can't manually review your PBE Application, but if you haven't applied for PBE access yet, you can do so from [**this link**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe). Additionally, you can find more about how we select testers and how the system works by reading through our [**PBE FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)

Let me know if you have any questions.

I want to recover my permanently suspender account , im not toxic , but my team think that and they report me for that.My teamates and enemies are tilting me so hard.So pls recover my account{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I'm unable to assist you with recovering an account here on the Boards, but if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K), we'll assist you in sorting your account out.

If you run into any issues submitting your ticket, let me know!
Riot Games dont wanna give me my account , worst company ever
